physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Multiple lentigines and two café-au-lait macules (>1.5 cm in diameter) developed primarily over the patient’s face, trunk, and upper arms.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: More than 100 lentigines developed over time.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Clinical examination showed no evidence of cutaneous, subcutaneous, or plexiform neurofibromas.
